trivia_items.text: Fartooth has the traits of a northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis), as shown by her richly streaked plumage on her hair. One can also be seen in a heraldic style on the background of her Elite 2 artwork.
sub_items: The heraldry bears very strong resemblance with the White Eagle (Orle Białym), the coat of arms of Poland based on the eponymous bird in Polish founding legend.

trivia_items.text: Her Hear the Wind Sing outfit is strongly inspired by Nuclear Mysticism, an art style created by the Surrealist artist Salvador Dalí. It is worth noted that her artist, NoirZC, has been recently exploring said art style.
sub_items: Due to an oversight, the name on her cap is written as "FARTOOH," with the second T accidentally omitted. A flash update fixed this issue, and NoirZC issued an apology on his Weibo.

trivia_items.text: Fartooth and Lunacub are the only Deadeye Operators who is deployed on to the map by dropping down on a selected area.
Fartooth has some minor jokes within the Arknights community:
sub_items: Much like Hellagur, there are several puns and wordplays made out of Fartooth's name by the EN community (e.g "FarTooth", "FartTooth", "Neartooth"...). This is the same in the CN community by changing the tones.
Because her Skill 3 has an infinite range, there are jokes featuring her shooting her arrows from faraway, especially from the moon, or have them circumnavigate until hitting her target.
